availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Josiah Jordan (Marshall County, farmer and soldier)

body.p: Marshall County Kentucky, farmer and soldier. Married to Zilpha Salyer Jordan on January 4, 1858. Served in the 3rd Kentucky Volunteer Mounted Infantry Regiment (C.S.A) as private and sergeant from 1861 to 1864.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Marshall County, p. 147.
Compiled Service Records of Confederate Soldiers who Served in Organizations from the State of Kentucky, NARA RG 109, Microfilm Series M319, Roll 92.
Marriage Records: Kentucky Marriages, (Richmond, KY: Madison County Courthouse), film no. 000321353, p. 1395.
